name: A rich mahogany symphonia
data: It has weak weapon class for its type (pathetic in general).
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It increases the users charisma impressively.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'instrumentation'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'tonal control'.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
